body_html:
@ffmpbgrnn I changed '256<<20' in coded_stream.h,and recompile,but it didn't work. My tensorflow is installed by pip,and then I uninstalled protobuf,download a new one,changed 256<<20,install new protobuf,but,the same error occurred:" A protocol message was rejected because it was too big (more than 67108864 bytes)." Could someone help me? I am crazy...:(
@VDalibard
